Title: Thoroughly expose and criticize the heinous crimes of the "Gang of Four" and their representatives in Liaoning
Designer: Lu Xun Art Academy (鲁迅美术学院)
Notes: Four-poster set exposing and criticizing the "Gang of Four" in cartoons. In some images, Lin Biao also appears; here, there is a reference to the crash that ended his "uprising" in 1971, killing him, his wife, his son and some of his followers.This is poster two.
Theme: Gang of Four (四人帮)Jiang QingZhang ChunqiaoYao WenyuanWang HongwenLin BiaoLu Xun
